1. Swiss president under fire after Trump call leads to US tariffs shock  The Guardian
  2. Neutrality Got the Swiss Nowhere on Tariffs  Bloomberg.com
  3. Swiss tensions run high as clock ticks on U.S. tariff deadline  CNBC
  4. America’s tariff avalanche catches Switzerland unawares  The Economist
  5. Switzerland Rushes to Give Trump ‘More Attractive’ Offer to Cut Tariffs  The New York Times
